mapper.sql: a.id AS "id", a.order_id AS "orderId", a.line_no AS "lineNo", a.p_line_no AS "pLineNo", a.sku_no AS "skuNo", a.part_no AS "partNo", a.sku_name AS "skuName", a.unit_price AS "unitPrice", a.ord_qty AS "ordQty", a.create_id AS "createId.id", a.create_time AS "createTime", a.u_version AS "uVersion", a.update_id AS "updateId.id", a.update_time AS "updateTime"
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO biz_po_detail( id, order_id, line_no, p_line_no, sku_no, part_no, sku_name, unit_price, ord_qty, create_id, create_time, u_version, update_id, update_time ) VALUES ( #{id}, #{orderId}, #{lineNo}, #{pLineNo}, #{skuNo}, #{partNo}, #{skuName}, #{unitPrice}, #{ordQty}, #{createId.id}, #{createTime}, #{uVersion}, #{updateId.id}, #{updateTime} )
mapper.update: UPDATE biz_po_detail SET order_id = #{orderId}, line_no = #{lineNo}, p_line_no = #{pLineNo}, sku_no = #{skuNo}, part_no = #{partNo}, sku_name = #{skuName}, unit_price = #{unitPrice}, ord_qty = #{ordQty}, u_version = #{uVersion}, update_id = #{updateId.id}, update_time = #{updateTime} WHERE id = #{id}
